script.name: !fight.attack.enemiesrange.land
script.description: Attack enemies in range and land if none there

line.comment: * Zero Hour 1.19 - Terraformer owned ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
* ZH 1.10 - Player owned OCV ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
* If we were supposed to land, we have to break this script.
* Return to the area we're supposed to watch, or idle, or wait.
* $posArray = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.GetValidPos' : sector=[SECTOR] minDistance=0 posArray=null verticalOnly=[FALSE] refobj=[THIS]
* = [THIS]-> call script '!move.movetoposition' : targetsector=[SECTOR] x=$x y=$y z=$z

sval.val: Attack enemies in range and land if none there
Zero Hour 1.19 - Terraformer owned ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
ZH 1.10 - Player owned OCV ships do not attack Terraformer made ships
If we were supposed to land, we have to break this script.
Return to the area we're supposed to watch, or idle, or wait.
$posArray = [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.GetValidPos' : sector=[SECTOR] minDistance=0 posArray=null verticalOnly=[FALSE] refobj=[THIS]
= [THIS]-> call script '!move.movetoposition' : targetsector=[SECTOR] x=$x y=$y z=$z
